name: Cosplay Maker
description: A cosplay management and dating simulation.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 3.0 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews.review_text: Super addictive and even when the story is complete I'm still playing to get everything. Check it out if you like management games!

Oh my god,this game is terrible, the art work is awful, the design of the clothes are bulky and slobby. The upbeat jazzy music as good as it is doesn't fit with the game at all! i played like 5 min and i can't stand it anymore....
